import React from "react"; import crypto from 'crypto-js'; import { dict } from "../../Dict"; import Moment from 'react-moment'; import 'moment-timezone'; const MeetingCard = (props) => { function meetingItems() { var result = [] props.meetings.map((meeting) => { result.push(
JL
{meeting.title}
{meeting.start_time}
) }) return result } return (
Add meeting Add attendees
{meetingItems()}
) } export default MeetingCard;
